name: Squirts - Eat & Grow
description:
No ads , no in-app purchases just the game !

Control your tiny dot and eat other dots to grow larger!

You can move very fast by splashing !! You can even slow and speed up time !

But watch out: guys bigger than you will be trying to make you their lunch.

Survive and eat long enough to become the biggest one in the game!

Quick, fun and a great pocket game ! No ads , no in-app purchases just the game !
